Charged_Bolts.help: The Hero can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.
Charged_Bolts.targetHelp: The Hero can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
{PlayerSource} shocks you with his {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

Gale.help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Gale.targetHelp: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Lightning_Bolt.help: The Hero can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.
Lightning_Bolt.targetHelp: The Hero can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

Ball_Lightning.help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.
Ball_Lightning.targetHelp: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

Thunder_Clap.help: The Thunder Clap has stunned you.
Thunder_Clap.targetHelp: The Thunder Clap has stunned you.

Freezing_Rain.help: Summons Freezing Rain at a targeted location. Freezing Rain deals minimal Cold damage to anything that passes through the storm. It also Slows the affected foes and severely reduces their Defense and resistance to damage. Many foes may even slip and fall trying to escape the storm. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
Freezing_Rain.targetHelp: Summons Freezing Rain at a targeted location. Freezing Rain deals minimal Cold damage to anything that passes through the storm. It also Slows the affected foes and severely reduces their Defense and resistance to damage. Many foes may even slip and fall trying to escape the storm. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long

Hurricane.help: The driving winds of the Hurricane are blinding you. Your Range and Accuracy are reduced.
Hurricane.targetHelp: The driving winds of the Hurricane are blinding you. Your Range and Accuracy are reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Lightning_Storm.help: The Hero can summon a massive Lightning Storm overhead that will strike any foe that approaches the Hero. Lightning Bolts from this storm can knock down and damage all foes near the strike, and can cause panic. Lightning Bolts will continue to strike for the lifetime of the storm.
Lightning_Storm.targetHelp: The Hero can summon a massive Lightning Storm overhead that will strike any foe that approaches the Hero. Lightning Bolts from this storm can knock down and damage all foes near the strike, and can cause panic. Lightning Bolts will continue to strike for the lifetime of the storm.

SummonFX.help: This power is simply the visual fx for when the Hero is released.
SummonFX.targetHelp: This power is simply the visual fx for when the Hero is released.
